content:
# It seems there was an error when trying to insert coal into the stone furnace due to an issue with the `furnace_position`. The `Position` object may not be correctly defined or used in this context.

# To resolve this, I will first ensure that the furnace is placed correctly and then use the correct method to reference the furnace for inserting items.

# Let's first check if the stone furnace has been placed successfully and retrieve its reference.

furnace_reference = get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)

# Now, I will insert coal into the furnace for it to operate.
insert_item(furnace_reference, Prototype.Coal, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of coal.

# Then, I'll insert the iron ore to smelt it into iron plates.
insert_item(furnace_reference, Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 units of iron ore.
